org.eng.aisp.classifier

Class AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier<WINDATA,FDATA>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eng.util.TaggedEntity
      • org.eng.aisp.classifier.AbstractClassifier<WINDATA>
        • org.eng.aisp.classifier.AbstractFixableClassifier<WINDATA>
          • org.eng.aisp.classifier.AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier<WINDATA,FDATA>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IClassifier<WINDATA>, IFixableClassifier<WINDATA>, IFixedClassifier<WINDATA>, ITaggedEntity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingUpdatableClassifier, AbstractFixableFeatureGramClassifier, AnomalyDetectorClassifier, CNNClassifier, GMMClassifier

    public abstract class AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier<WINDATA,FDATA>
extends AbstractFixableClassifier<WINDATA>
implements IFixableClassifier<WINDATA>
    Provides a base set of function for implementers of IFixableClassifer that need to perform feature extraction. Extends the super class to extract the features for the subclass implementations of trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures(Iterable).
    Author:
    dawood
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        protected static final boolean DefaultSoftReferenceFeatures

      • softReferenceFeatures

        protected final boolean softReferenceFeatures
        If false, then features are computed all at once and in addition to be placed in the case are hard-referenced during training. If true, then features are not hard referenced in LabeledFeatureIterable during training and they are only maintained in the soft cache so may be evicted.

        Deprecated. in favor of #AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean, String, IFeatureExtractor, IFeatureProcessor, int, int, boolean, boolean)
        Convenience over #AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean, String, IFeatureExtractor, IFeatureProcessor, int, int, boolean, boolean) that does no local feature caching.

        protected AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean preShuffleData,
                                                     ITrainingWindowTransform<WINDATA> transform,
                                                     List<IFeatureGramDescriptor<WINDATA,FDATA>> featureGramExtractors)
        A convenience on AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean, ITrainingWindowTransform, List, boolean, boolean, boolean) that sets the last 3 params to false as such assumes features will be hard referenced during training.
        Parameters:
        preShuffleData -
        transform -
        featureGramDescriptors -

      • AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier

        protected AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean preShuffleData,
                                                     ITrainingWindowTransform<WINDATA> transform,
                                                     List<IFeatureGramDescriptor<WINDATA,FDATA>> featureGramExtractors,
                                                     boolean useMemoryCache,
                                                     boolean useDiskCache,
                                                     boolean softReferenceFeatures)
        The fundamental constructor.
        Parameters:
        preShuffleData - if true, the shuffle that data (in a repeatable way) during training
        transform - the optional transform to be applied to the training data. The transform is only applied to training data so should be some form of augmentation and not transformation of the original data. This is NOT applied during classification.
        featureGramDescriptors - a list of 1 or more feature gram extractors. The underlying model must be prepared to handle the number of feature grams generated (i.e. the size of this list).
        useMemoryCache - - should memory caching of features be enabled during training.
        useDiskCache - - should disk caching of features be enabled during training.
        softReferenceFeatures - - if true, then features will be computed on demand and placed in the cache(s) only. If false, then features are computed and maintained both inside and outside of the cache (using a hard reference) during training.

      • AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier

        protected AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean preShuffleData,
                                                     ITrainingWindowTransform<WINDATA> transform,
                                                     IFeatureGramDescriptor<WINDATA,FDATA> featureGramExtractor,
                                                     boolean useMemoryCache,
                                                     boolean useDiskCache)

      • AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier

        protected AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean preShuffleData,
                                                     IFeatureGramDescriptor<WINDATA,FDATA> featureGramExtractor,
                                                     boolean useDiskCache)

      • AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier

        protected AbstractFixableFeatureExtractingClassifier(boolean preShuffleData,
                                                     ITrainingWindowTransform<WINDATA> transforms,
                                                     IFeatureExtractor<WINDATA,FDATA> featureExtractor,
                                                     List<IFeatureProcessor<FDATA>> featureProcessors,
                                                     int windowSizeMsec,
                                                     int windowShiftMsec,
                                                     boolean useMemoryCache,
                                                     boolean useDiskCache)
        #param preShuffleData causes training data to be shuffled before feature are extractor or transforms are applied.
        Parameters:
        transform - optional transform applied to data before features are extracted.
        featureExtractor - extract applied to windows or subwindows of the labeled data.
        windowSizeMsec - the size of the subwindows into which each labeled data window is divided into. Set to 0 to not subdivide the labeled data windows.
        windowShiftMsec - the amount of shift in time between subsequent subwindows. Typical values are #windowSizeMsec or #windowSizeMsec/2.
        useMemoryCache - if true, then cache the extracted features using a memory cache. This is probably used for smaller data sets and when the subclass makes multiple passes through the features during training.
        useDiskCache - if true, then cache the extracted features using a disk cache. This is used for larger data sets and when the classifier makes multiple passes through the features during training. The former gives pure rolling windows, the latter a sliding window in which each subwindow overlaps with half the previous. Use 0 to set to rolling windows
        featureProcessor - option processor that acts on 1 or more features extracted from a single window.

      • trainFixedClassifierOnData

        protected final IFixedClassifier<WINDATA> trainFixedClassifierOnData(String trainingLabel,
                                                                     Iterable<? extends ILabeledDataWindow<WINDATA>> data)
                                                              throws AISPException
        Implements feature extraction on the data. The features are then passed to the sub class via trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures(Iterable) to actually build the classifier. Each ILabeledDataWindow in the given iterable is processed to produce an array of 1 or more features as determined by the #windowSizeMsec and #windowShiftMsec. If #windowSizeMsec is 0, then the size of the array will be one, otherise for each labeled data window it will be of size at least (window duration / #windowSizeMsec plus more depending on the value of #windowShiftMsec.
        Specified by:
        trainFixedClassifierOnData in class AbstractFixableClassifier<WINDATA>
        Parameters:
        trainingLabel - TODO
        data - data passed to #train(Iterable) that has at least one item.
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        AISPException

      • checkFeatureGrams

        protected void checkFeatureGrams(Iterable<ILabeledFeatureGram<FDATA>[]> fi)
                          throws AISPException
        Look at the first feature gram in each array of feature grams to make sure they have at least one feature.
        Parameters:
        fi -
        Throws:
        AISPException - if invalid feature gram is found.

      • trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures

        protected abstract IFixedClassifier<WINDATA> trainFixedClassifierOnFeatures(Iterable<? extends ILabeledFeatureGram<FDATA>[]> features)
                                                                     throws AISPException
        Build the classifier from the given set of features. If this is called, then the iterable has at least one feature array in it. primaryTrainingLabel has been set to the value passed to AbstractFixableClassifier.train(String, Iterable) when this is called and should be used by the implementation to define the labels on which the model is trained.
        Parameters:
        features - the iterable over arrays of labeled features. Each array of features corresponds to an individual training sample as provided to trainFixedClassifierOnData(String, Iterable) as part of the iterable provided there.
        Returns:
        never null.
        Throws:
        AISPException
